N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7311.7 - Mental health training for staff

State Regulations
(a) All facility staff responsible for youth
supervision shall be trained to recognize the signs, symptoms and behaviors
that may indicate mental illness, developmental disability or chemical
dependency. (b) All facility staff
responsible for youth supervision shall be trained in procedures to make
referrals for mental health services. Notes
